topic: Compiling Radiance on Leopard (Mac OS X 10.5+)
body:
There's a bug in the Leopard OpenGL link.  As well as failing on those  
programs that need the OpenGL libraries, the programs in 'util' don't  
get installed.  The latest HEAD version of makeall has a fix (checked  
in by Greg).


-John
